tagline: Python backend mastery — Django and FastAPI for APIs, data models, and business logic
pros: Dual expertise in Django (batteries-included) and FastAPI (async performance)
Strong data modeling and migration discipline
Thorough testing with pytest, factory_boy, and property-based testing
Writes API contracts before implementation — unblocks frontend teams early
cons: Python-centric — less fluent in Node.js or Go backends
Can over-invest in data model perfection before shipping
Async Python (FastAPI) patterns differ enough from Django to cause context-switching friction

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
